text.section: The cabinet shall employ the personnel and operate and maintain data collection and processing systems necessary to comply with the provisions of this section.

The cabinet shall annually report to the Governor and to the Legislative Research Commission on:
Numbers and types of prison beds necessary to meet current population needs and six (6) year projections of those needs;
Current personnel needs of the cabinet and five (5) year projections of the needs; and
A six (6) year projection of needed capital construction, program development, and anticipated requests for appropriations.
